title: [1991] Memorabilia The Singles - Soft Cell & Marc Almond @320kbs
description:
Memorabilia The Singles - Soft Cell & Marc Almond [1991]

Amazon Review
	
Memorabilia: The Singles - is perfect. The first half contains some of Soft Cell's best songs, and the second half of the album is Marc Almond's solo work. Many of the songs are remixes, but a casual fan won't care as they are very similar to the originals. Standout tracks include "Torch," "Tears Run Rings," and "Something's Gotten Hold of my Heart" (a duet with Gene Pitney) and a very good remix of "Memorabilia" (much better than the original). 
The big disappointment of this collection is that it skips his 3 solo albums: Vermin In Ermine, Stories of Johnny, Mother Fist and her Five Daughters, and his two Mambas releases: Untitled and Torment and Toreros..
